title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same capabilities as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as drop-in LLMs for chains, agents, RAG, tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama; markdown, code highlight, multi-model chats, RAG, user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Minimal RAG template: load PDFs → Chroma → Ollama model via LangChain; ready-to-run notebook.

title: ollama-copilot-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Npm install -g ollama-cli; chat, manage models, pipe stdin/stdout from shell scripts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistence support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models via OpenAI-style calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate; strongly-typed client for chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; deploy via Docker.

title: ollama-rag-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run private RAG over your vault using Ollama embeddings & chat.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama; small footprint, async HTTP, streams chat responses.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers in pipelines for testing or codegen.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that answers questions over your uploaded documents using Ollama + Chroma RAG.
